name: Deep sea diver
description:
It's time to find some treasure!

Dive head first into this mysterious underwater world in search of fishes and riches... You will need to navigate in clever ways to avoid getting eaten, and trick the fishes into getting caught in your ship's nets!
Dodge your way to the depths to retrieve the 3 golden items and bring them back safely to your ship!

Controls

ZQSD/WASD/Arrows : move
E/Right control : drop some bait
R/Right shift : rewind

Credits

Fishing reel sound by et_graham
Bait sound by zevcuk
Splash by InspectorJ
Fish capture by InspectorJ
Clown horn by Stickinthemud
Swordfish windup by Timbre
Swordfish charge by AlienXXX

Font by OmegaPC777

Music by Melissotarsus
